Work Experience.where: NUS Research Project "Crowdsourcing Perceptions of Urban Environments"
description: Redesigned the frontend of a crowdsourced data platform with HTML, CSS and JavaScript, improving visual appeal and user engagement in collaboration with a UI/UX designer and cross-faculty professors.
Implemented interactive map visualizations with Leaflet, enabling intuitive navigation and cross-device responsiveness.

Optimized codebase for improved readability and long-term maintainability and maintained Firebase backend to securely store user data and manage authentication, enabling efficient and structured data retrieval for research analysis.

Work Experience.where: NUS Enterprise - Minimum Viable Product (MVP) Studio
